item.title: The Mathematics behind Solar Eclipse
item.description: Introduction On April 8, 2024, the people in Texas, United States of America, will watch a cosmic event taking place before their very rise, a total solar eclipse. Well, if you’re not a believer in the myths of asuras named Rahu and Ketu, then for you a solar eclipse occurs when the shadow of the moon falls directly on a location on the Earth, and the moon obstructs our view of the Sun.
